lane.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a narrow road in the countryside
lane.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a road in a city, often used in road names
lane.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: the Hilton Hotel in Park Lane
a network of alleys and back lanes  (=narrow unimportant roads, often behind a row of houses)
lane.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: one of the two or three parallel areas on a road which are divided by painted lines to keep traffic apart
lane.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: That idiot changed lanes without signalling.
Use the outside lane for overtaking only.
Cars in the fast lane were travelling at over 80 miles an hour.
lane.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: one of the narrow parallel areas marked for each competitor in a running or swimming race
lane.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a line or course along which ships or aircraft regularly travel between ports or airports
